alterego_mod:MasochisticConstitution.NAME: Masochistic Constitution
alterego_mod:MasochisticConstitution.FLAVOR: Direct all of their hatred towards yourself.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain 1 Max HP after every battle in which you took unblocked damage.

alterego_mod:FleetingLove.NAME: Fleeting Love
alterego_mod:FleetingLove.FLAVOR: Wronged by the one you loved, you close your heart off from others.
DESCRIPTIONS: You can take a maximum of 6 damage on the first turn of combat.

alterego_mod:SomeoneToFightFor.NAME: Someone to Fight For
alterego_mod:SomeoneToFightFor.FLAVOR: Thinking about your lover waiting for you is really motivating!
DESCRIPTIONS: Start combat in a random Alterego #yStance.

alterego_mod:SistersRibbon.NAME: Sister's Ribbon
alterego_mod:SistersRibbon.FLAVOR: If only you could reach into the past, and talk to her before all of this.
DESCRIPTIONS: NL Usable once per combat. NL Right click: Move a card from your exhaust pile to your hand.
